description.english: Kill a Hero to bring back your entire gang when at 0 reinforcements on a full multiplayer server

description.brazilian: Liberte todos os civis congelados em gelo criogênico

description.english: Stop Anarky thug operations in South Gotham
description.german: Unterbinde die Aktivitäten der Anarky-Anhänger in South Gotham
description.french: Mettez fin aux opérations des sbires d'Anarky au sud de Gotham
description.italian: Ferma le operazioni criminali di Anarky a Gotham sud
description.koreana: 고담 남부에서 아나키 부하들이 벌이는 작전을 저지하십시오.
description.spanish: Detén a los matones de Anarky en el sur de la ciudad.
description.russian: Нейтрализуйте бандитов Анарки в Южном Готэме
description.japanese: サウス・ゴッサムでのアナーキーの手下の活動を止めろ
description.polish: Zatrzymaj działania zbirów Anarky'ego w południowym Gotham
description.brazilian: Interrompa as operações dos capangas do Anarquia no sul de Gotham

description.english: Get 3 enemies frozen in one attack
description.german: Sorge dafür, dass 3 Gegner gleichzeitig mit nur einem Angriff eingefroren werden
description.french: Faites geler 3 ennemis en une seule attaque
description.italian: Congela 3 nemici con un unico attacco
description.koreana: 1회 공격으로 3명의 적을 얼리십시오.
description.spanish: Congela a tres enemigos con un único ataque.
description.japanese: 1回の攻撃で3人の敵を凍らせろ
description.polish: Zamróź 3 przeciwników jednym atakiem
description.brazilian: Congele 3 inimigos com um único ataque

description.english: Takedown 2 enemies with one stalactite
description.german: Schalte 2 Gegner gleichzeitig mit einem Stalaktiten aus
description.french: Éliminez 2 ennemis avec une seule stalactite
description.italian: Esegui KO su 2 nemici con un'unica stalattite
description.koreana: 종유석 1개로 2명의 적을 테이크다운하십시오.
description.spanish: Elimina a dos enemigos con una única estalactita.
description.japanese: 1つの氷柱で2人の敵を倒せ
description.polish: Przewróć 2 przeciwników jednym stalaktytem
description.brazilian: Elimine 2 inimigos com uma estalactite

description.english: Perform 3 ice wall takedowns
description.german: Führe 3 Eiswand-Ausschaltmanöver durch
description.french: Exécutez 3 éliminations à travers un mur de glace
description.italian: Esegui 3 KO muro di ghiaccio
description.koreana: 얼음벽 테이크다운을 3회 실행하십시오.
description.spanish: Ejecuta tres eliminaciones con pared de hielo.
description.russian: Выполните 3 решающих приема из-за ледяной стены
description.japanese: 氷の壁越しにテイクダウンを3回繰り出せ
description.polish: Wykonaj 3 przewrócenia przez ściany lodu
description.brazilian: Execute 3 golpes de parede de gelo
